The GEO-Max Service System

A unified workflow designed for the AI search era. GEO-Max helps you improve visibility, credibility, and long-term discoverability across generative engines.

Content Optimization

Rewrite your content into AI-ready structure. Clearer intent → better model retrieval → higher citation likelihood.

Source Authority Amplification

Strengthen your brand’s credibility with structured facts, schema markup, and verifiable signals AI models can trust.

Multi-Model Distribution

Deliver optimized content across leading AI ecosystems—ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, and more—with one unified workflow.

View Examples Talk to the Team

The GEO-Max 3-Step System

A simple, structured workflow designed for the AI search era — helping your content get understood, cited, and trusted by generative engines.

  • 1

    Semantic Analysis

    Identify keyword intent, semantic gaps, and trusted sources across major AI models — revealing why your content isn’t being surfaced today.

  • 2

    Content Reconstruction

    Rewrite and restructure your content using GEO-Score and reasoning chains to make it clearer, more factual, and more compatible with generative engines.

  • 3

    Feedback Tracking

    Monitor where and when your content appears in AI answers. Iterate based on citation frequency, visibility signals, and model responses.

“After applying GEO-Max, our content started showing up in ChatGPT and Claude answers for the first time.”
